pageContext.title: What information does EcoCart collect?
pageContext.content: We only collect information that we believe can help you accurately offset the carbon impact of your online orders. If you choose to register as a member, you can provide your name, email, and other general profile information. Like most other web services, EcoCart collects technical information about your device and how you use EcoCart to make sure that our products are working right, to help calculate the carbon emissions generated by your order(s), and to detect and prevent fraud.Â
